Room.Name: Men's Restroom
Room.ShortDescription: This is the Men's Restroom in the Dragon Tooth Inn. It's not very clean.
Room.LongDescription: As a matter of fact, there's nothing here in the way of plumbing, either. The room is quite bare except for a dark hole in the floor, and there's an awful smell coming from the hole. The floor is wet where a few drunks have missed their opportunity, so it's a good thing you are wearing boots.
